H0.text: Who performed the theme song to The Man With The Golden Gun. Shirley Bassey

H1.text: Who performed the theme song to The Man With The Golden Gun. Tom Jones

H2.text: Who performed the theme song to The Man With The Golden Gun. Nancy Sinatra

H3.text: Who performed the theme song to The Man With The Golden Gun. LULU

A4.text: The theme tune to The Man with the Golden Gun, released in 1974, was performed by Scottish singer Lulu and composed by John Barry.
